direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods generate JSON strings based on input field expressions, with similar control flow and parameter handling.
Both methods generate structured data (JSON vs CSV) based on input expressions, with similar logic for processing and generating output.
The jsona method relies on the resolveExpression method for processing expressions, indicating a strong dependency.
Both methods access and manipulate data resources (YAML files) to generate output, with similar exception handling and resource management.
Both methods generate strings based on input patterns, though regexify focuses on regular expressions while jsona generates JSON strings.
